Name: Customer BoulPat PAW
Expression: TM1SubsetToSet([SLS_CUSTOMER] , IIF([zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Level_Customer_BoulPat]) <> "" , IIF([zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Customer IC BoulPat]) <> "" , IIF([zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Level_Customer_BoulPat]) = "Ship-to-party" , "Ship-to-party BoulPat" , "Filtre BoulPat") , IIF([zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Level_Customer_BoulPat]) = "Ship-to-party" , "MDX_Sales_Group_level0" , [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Level_Customer_BoulPat]))) , IIF([zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Customer IC BoulPat]) <> "" , "Ship-to-party BoulPat" , "MDX_Sales_Group_level0")))
